page.title: 01ARTS&CRAFTS ATTITUDES
page.content:
QUITE A FEW PEOPLE IN THE AREA ARE INVOLVED IN PAINTING,A CLUB BEING HELD WEEKLY IN THE NEXT VILLAGE. GLASS ENGRAVING IS BECOMING A NEW CRAFT INTEREST. THE BLACKSMITH STILL MAKES WROUGHT-IRON GATES AND FIRESIDE ORNAMENTS.
{ATTITUDES THESE ARE MORE OR LESS THE SAME AS NATIONALLY IE. DESPAIR AT DRUG ABUSE, ALCOHOLISM,VIOLENCE BUT GENERALLY THE PEOPLE HERE ARE GLAD TO BE LIVING WHERE THEY ARE, WHERE LIFE IS MORE RELAXED AND PEACEFULAND NOT IN LARGE URBAN AREAS WHERE CRIME AND UNREST ARE RIFE.
